title: Investing in Real Estate Versus the Stock Market: A Wise Choice
subtitle: Discover why investing in real estate can be more advantageous than the stock market, especially during downturns. Learn from expert insights on rental income and tax benefits.
content:
Dad, the stock market is crashing.

Yes, it is.

Why are you smiling?

Because I invest in real estate.

How is that any better?

Because I'm self-employed and have rental income.

That rental income is not considered earned income. No FICA tax.

That's 15.3% that goes back into, you guessed it, more real estate instead of to the government.

Oh, and it's a hedge against inflation. Seems timely, no?

Where did you learn all this?

I just follow Social Cap. He makes complex finance seem easy.
